document.full_text: world number one caroline wozniacki survived an early scare to win 10 straight games and crush german andrea petkovic 6-4 6-1 on thursday for a spot in the last four of the stuttgart grand prix.
document.title: caroline wozniacki eases into stuttgart semi-finals
lines_and_colors: world number one caroline wozniacki survived an early scare to win 10 straight games and crush german andrea petkovic 6-4 6-1 on thursday for a spot in the last four of the stuttgart grand prix.
